name: The Arcane Artist
description:
Trying out spells may have disastrous results.

Paint the spells on the ground in an attempt to delay your demise.

Find forgotten tomes to learn the spells or figure them out via trial and error.

🎮 Controls
  • 🏃‍♂️ Move - WASD
  • 🎨 Paint - Mouse 1

Music from OpenGameArt

Note: The game doesn’t seem to work well with Mac + Firefox or Safari, please use Chrome if drawing does not work ❤️
